Html: I want to use this component as internal component. How can I change the Gmap component To I use it as non DLL component  ?
When I Use GMAp I must put some DLL file with it ( like GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll) . I want to my program works as standalone program & It don't need dll files.
whats the point, sure you can do that, but that will be a little pain for you to do ;} ..and you miss any updates too, but thats your choice, just add all source files into one project

I use VB, and looked at doing something similar, except that within VS2003, you can't mix projects of different languages, VB & VC++ etc. Has this changed now with VS2010 ? can you mix a VB and VC++ in a single solution?
in single solution - yes, but in separate projects.
